nodes.text: The ruins of a bombed paper mill, located on a planet with an undeveloped society, was the residence of the human female Everi Chalis prior to the rise of the Galactic Empire in 19 BBY. During her time at the mill, Chalis shared a stained mattress with her mother. She later recalled the experience to the Rebel Alliance First Sergeant Hazram Namir in 3 ABY.
The paper mill was mentioned in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
